ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: All went well :) We did it the old fashoined way.  11 people (recruited a couple of guild friends to make two full groups, our guild is short on muscle) They
ygData.messageBody:
All went well :)

We did it the old fashoined way. 11 people (recruited a couple of guild
friends to make two full groups, our guild is short on muscle)

They spent about an hour getting together and getting to the room where I
was imprisoned. (while I was playing my iksar monk, got him from 8 to 10
running around the pit buffed out wazoo).

From their we decided to go for the big camp (the church). It was a great
guild night. 2 full groups, non stop multi mob pulls. The boss (I forgot
his name) showed up once. Unfortunatly the only warrior there didn't want
his sword (he was the only guild person there who could use it), so a lvl 20
warrior in our guild (who happened to be online at the time) is pretty darn
lucky (its a 2HS 23/40 3dex/str).

None the less we got 3 of those nice daggers and about 8 weight reducing
packs (and lots of XP! 0 deaths!)

I also got to show off my new drum as the main boss is a 42 necro, so I wove
guardian and purifying rythms and he couldn't get anything to stick on us.
(we made sure my group kept his attention as I am the only bard in the
guild)
